Method Detail

getLeaderboards

AGResponseHandle<GetLeaderboardsResponse> getLeaderboards(java.lang.Object... userData)
Request all leaderboards for this game. The results will be returned in the response handle as a RequestLeaderboardsResponse.

Parameters:
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns the handle to poll for completion or to set a callback on.

submitScore

AGResponseHandle<SubmitScoreResponse> submitScore(java.lang.String leaderboardId,
                                                  long score,
                                                  java.lang.Object... userData)
Request that a score be submitted to the leaderboard. Returns a handle that receives the response

Parameters:
leaderboardId - Leaderboard ID to submit the score to.
score - Score to submit.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns the handle to poll for completion or to set a callback on.

getScores

AGResponseHandle<GetScoresResponse> getScores(java.lang.String leaderboardId,
                                              com.amazon.ags.constants.LeaderboardFilter filter,
                                              java.lang.Object... userData)
Request the top 100 scores from a leaderboard based on the filter selected. Result is returned to the ResponseHandler callback

Parameters:
leaderboardId - Leaderboard ID to get scores from.
filter - Filter to apply to the request.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.

getLocalPlayerScore

AGResponseHandle<GetPlayerScoreResponse> getLocalPlayerScore(java.lang.String leaderboardId,
                                                             com.amazon.ags.constants.LeaderboardFilter filter,
                                                             java.lang.Object... userData)
Requests the current users top RankedScore for the leaderboard. Returns a handle that receives the response

Parameters:
leaderboardId - Leaderboard ID to get scores from.
filter - Filter to apply to the request.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns the handle to poll for completion or to set a callback on.

                                                                       com.amazon.ags.constants.LeaderboardFilter filter,
                                                                       java.lang.Object... userData)
Requests the percentile ranks for the passed leaderboard.

Parameters:
leaderboardId - Leaderboard ID to get scores from.
filter - Filter to apply to the request.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns the handle to poll for completion or to set a callback on.

showLeaderboardsOverlay

AGResponseHandle<RequestResponse> showLeaderboardsOverlay(java.lang.Object... userData)
Show the leaderboards overlay for the game.

Parameters:
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns the handle to poll for completion or to set a callback on.

showLeaderboardOverlay

AGResponseHandle<RequestResponse> showLeaderboardOverlay(java.lang.String leaderboardId,
                                                         java.lang.Object... userData)
Show the leaderboard overlay for a particular leaderboard.

Parameters:
leaderboardId - Leaderboard ID to show.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns the handle to poll for completion or to set a callback on.
